trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.
Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém “DocumentViewer”.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, this method returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, esse método retornará <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method also sets <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" /> as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.EventsSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também define <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" /> como o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.EventsSource" />.
